page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH
page.content: In the morning I get up at 8.15,I feel like going to sleep again but I get out of bed and go to the bathroom.I have to wait a long time to get washed because my sister is "hours" in the bathroom.Finally I get washed and make my mind up about what to wear.When I have chosen I run downstairs and greet my dog.I have to play with him otherwise he goes in his box and sulks.My mum gives me a cup of tea,I can't eat breakfast,and when I have finished I run back upstairs,clean my teeth, brush my hair,put my coat on and walk to school.At dinner time I go home and have my dinner and at 1pm I go back to school.At 3.30pm I leave school,I go home,drop in the armchair and my mum gives me a drink.At 5pm I have my tea.Later I go out to play.At 8.30pm I go in,have a drink and some sweets,then I go to bed.
